title: Taramasalata
ingredients: ["200g smoked cod's roe", '50g (1 thick slice) stale white bread, crusts removed', '2 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '8 tbsp olive oil', '3 tbsp lemon juice', '1 garlic clove, crushed', 'freshly ground black pepper', 'To garnish', 'wedge of lemon', 'sprigs of flat-leaf parsley']
